org.apache.james.protocols.api
Interface CommandHandler<Session extends ProtocolSession>

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractHookableCmdHandler, AuthCmdHandler, DataCmdHandler, EhloCmdHandler, ExpnCmdHandler, HeloCmdHandler, HelpCmdHandler, MailCmdHandler, NoopCmdHandler, QuitCmdHandler, RcptCmdHandler, RsetCmdHandler, StartTlsCmdHandler, UnknownCmdHandler, VrfyCmdHandler
public interface CommandHandler<Session extends ProtocolSession>

Custom command handlers must implement this interface The command handlers will be Server wide common to all the handlers, therefore the command handlers must store all the state information in the Session object
